title: FULL-STACK WEB DEVELOPER (M/W/D)
body:
We are seeking a Full-Stack Developer (f/m) who has a strong drive for quality of his/her work, is eager to

learn and share his/her knowledge within our team and strives for delivering the best solution to a customer

problem.

Humai Technologies (www.humai.tech) was founded in 1998 as a spin-off from the Vienna University of

Technology and the Berndorf Industry Group, with the mission to develop first-class solutions by using

Artificial intelligence (AI), Machine learning, Virtual Reality (VR), and Augmented Reality (AR) based solutions.

  • Mobile Machine Assistants for industrial plants and machine manufacturers
  • Parts and component group recognition with our Partium search technology
  • MagicLens – Interactive 3D and Augmented Reality visualizations

ROLE:











SKILLS REQUIRED:

  • Design and write automated test plans to maintain a reliable code base
  • Design and continuously improve quality metrics using open source tools
  • Develop heterogeneous distributed applications to deploy on cloud as well as
on-premise environments
  • Identify, record, document and track bugs
  • Promote software quality assurance within all of Humai
  • Develop mobile applications using multi-platform frameworks such as
NativeScript
  • Deliver well-tested web API's using modern best practices
  • Work in close collaboration with UX designers to deliver exciting applications

  • Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes
  • Experience in writing automated unit and integration tests
  • Experience in development of state-of-the-art applications (RESTful API design,
real-time event-based applications or similar)
  • Knowledge of at least one programming language between TypeScript, Python
or Java
  • Knowledge of at least one SPA framework such Angular.io, React.js or Vue.js
  • Proficient in spoken English or German


NICE TO HAVE: • Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus

  • Experience with frontend testing tools (e.g. Jasmine, Selenium)
  • Automation tools (e.g. GitLab, SonarQube)
  • Confident with Linux shell




WHAT WE

OFFER:

  • The opportunity to work on exciting projects with our AI solutions on-cloud
and on-site premises
  • Chance to grow and expand your skills and expertise in our rapidly growing
company
  • Flexible working hours (home office options)
  • The stability of a company with 20 years of experience and support by one
of Austria‘s leading industry groups combined with the enthusiasm and
tightknit feeling of a start-up
  • Friday game nights, free snacks and drinks, chance to unwind and socialize
with your peers and co-workers
  • Fun company events such as: soccer matches, paddle boarding, hackathons,
night outs, after-works out in town, culinary workshops, game nights and
much more


HOW TO APPLY:


If you are interested to meet us and discuss

any opportunities, please send your

application to jobs@humai.tech. Please

include at least one concise CV as well as

any information that you find convincing

about your ability to perform in the

described position.

Reference for this position:

Stephan Ganzinger, Recruiting Manager:

+43 1 234 4624-72
